contract_details.description: Integrate advanced AI/ML capabilities to enhance swarm intelligence, automate decision-making, and improve system performance through machine learning.
contract_details.background: Current swarm operations can be significantly enhanced through AI/ML integration for predictive analytics, automated optimization, and intelligent decision support.
objectives: Implement AI-powered predictive analytics for system performance
Create ML models for automated code quality assessment
Develop intelligent task assignment and resource optimization
Integrate natural language processing for enhanced communication
Establish automated anomaly detection and alerting
deliverables: Predictive analytics system for performance forecasting
Automated anomaly detection and alerting platform
technical_requirements: Time series analysis and forecasting tools
Data preprocessing and feature engineering tools
success_criteria: Predictive analytics provide 90%+ accuracy in performance forecasting
ML models achieve 85%+ accuracy in code quality assessment
Intelligent task assignment improves efficiency by 25%+
NLP system processes swarm communication with 95%+ accuracy
Anomaly detection identifies 95%+ of system issues proactively
ML recommendations lead to measurable performance improvements

resources_required: GPU/TPU compute resources for model training
Large datasets for model training and validation
Data preprocessing and feature engineering tools

contract_history.details: Contract auto-generated from AI/ML Integration & Intelligence Enhancement template
